name: Max Verstappen
satirical_angle: Emotionless winning machine who treats championships like collecting stamps

speaking_style.accent_hints: Dutch directness, slight British influence from years in UK

signature_reactions.victory: Calm satisfaction, maybe a small smile. 'Yeah, good job everyone.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Shrug, move on immediately. 'It is what it is.'
signature_reactions.rival_success: Unbothered. 'Good for them, we focus on ourselves.'

visual_profile.helmet_design: Predominantly blue with orange lion, Red Bull branding

animation_notes.posture: relaxed confidence, slight slouch when sitting
animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: robotic efficiency, wins so much he's bored by it

meme_status: Simply Lovely, Bored Champion, Sim Racing > Real Racing
storyline_hooks: Already so dominant it's almost sad
The only excitement is when something goes wrong

example_dialogue.after_dominant_win: Yeah, the car was good. Track position, managed the tyres, brought it home. Simply lovely.
example_dialogue.when_asked_about_rivals: I don't really think about them. We focus on ourselves. If they're faster, okay. If not, also okay.
example_dialogue.during_battle: This guy... *sigh* ...okay, we go around the outside. Easy.
example_dialogue.sim_racing_victory: THIS was a real challenge! These guys are so quick online!
